VA Artificial Intelligence
Vision Statement

 

The VAâ€™s Artificial Intelligence (AI) vision is to improve outcomes and experiences for our Veterans by developing trustworthy AI capabilities to support the Department of Veterans Affairs mission.

Mission Statement

The Department of Veterans Affairs will build robust capabilities in AI to develop and apply innovative AI solutions and transform the VA by facilitating a learning environment that supports the delivery of world-class benefits and services to our Veterans.

 

Why AI at VA?

VA is leading the development of AI solutions to benefit Veterans, their caregivers and survivors.

To learn more, join the AI@VA Community.

VA develops and contributes to AI policies, processes and strategies, with a focus on delivering AI excellence to Veterans
